value.title: #D49 - Add rows and columns to tables using M in power query
value.excerpt: In this video, I am going to show you how to add column and rows to a table in power query without appending it. Simply using the M language. #powerquery #curbal #powerbi   Here you can download all the pbix file (download 49- community downloads): https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn

value.title: Avoid the full refresh with Incremental Refresh in Power BI (Premium)

value.title: Generate Year Month Day Combinations in Power BI Report using Power Query Date ToText Function
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. value.title: Using ALLEXCEPT vs ALL VALUES
value.excerpt: ALLEXCEPT is a handy DAX function to retrieve all the columns of a table except for some. When used as a CALCULATE modifier, its behavior is less intuitive and might result in inaccurate measures. In this video, we elaborate on the most common mistake when using ALLEXCEPT in CALCULATE. Article and download:

value.title: Work with Power BI visuals
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose from the exceptional visuals that Power BI makes available to you. Formatting visuals will direct the user’s attention to exactly where you want it, while helping to make the visual easier to read and interpret. You will also learn about how to use key performance indicators (KPIs).

value.title: Advanced Concatenate/ Merge columns with Power Query
